comments.content:
I love the old hand drawn clock numerals. No fonts match but for the beautiful curl in numerals like \_2\_ consider Walbaum Fraktur [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/walbaum-fraktur/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414211506/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/walbaum-fraktur/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/walbaum-fraktur/")  
Don
